Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Actuator seal leakage. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Utility Hydraulics component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 22/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
